parameters.name: DisplayName
parameters.description:
The display name of the member account.

The name must be 2 to 50 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), periods (.), and hyphens (-).

The name must be unique in the current resource directory.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: The email address used to log on to the cloud account.

parameters.name: ParentFolderId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent folder.

parameters.name: PayerAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the settlement account. If you do not specify this parameter, the current account is used for settlement.
